tourBios.curYrHigh: Earned status with rounds of 74-73-69-69 at Florida's Q-School.
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Had one top-10, two top-25s and four cuts made in 8 starts on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica. His only top-10 was T7 at the Dominican Republic Open in June… Had joined the Tour with a T26 at the Lima, Peru Q-School in January.

2014: Finished T6 at PGA TOUR Canada Q-School outside Orlando to earn exempt status for 2014... After missing five straight cuts and six of eight to start the season, finished T10 at The Great Waterway Classic for first career top 10. Posted rounds of 68-68 on the weekend to finish five strokes behind champion David Bradshaw. Made the cut in 4 of 11 starts and finished the season ranked 81st on the Order of Merit.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Played college golf at Armstrong State University, where he was a three-time All-American… Claimed seven individual titles, including a record of four wins during his junior season (2007-08)… Attended Warner Robins High School, where he was a two-time region champion for the Demons.

tourBios.curYrHigh: Earned status with rounds of 74-73-69-69 at Florida's Q-School.
tourBios.personal: Twitter is @ChrisLWolfe05...Favorite course he's played is Southern Hills CC in Tulsa, Okla. His favorite professional teams he follows are the Atlanta Braves and Atlanta Falcons.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri was T7th in 2015 at the Dominican Republic Open.
